summary: Chronicles the life of famous doctor (fictional) through a series of flashbacks, as he is travelling to his native place after decades where it all began in extremely modest circumstances.
cast: Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Uttara Baokar|Siddharth Daftardar|Mahesh Elkunchwar|Atul Kulkarni|Ravindra Mankani
title: Vaastupurush
